    • How to use the .data section

data.asm

First comes the data section, where we declare some names. 

            
.data
    x: .byte 8
    y: .short 16
    z: .long 32

Next is the .text section, where we use them: 

            
.text
    mov eax, x
    mov ebx, y
    mov ecx, z
